content:
I just updated my security IG to use the hl7.fhir.template, and it failed to build
org.hl7.fhir.exceptions.FHIRException: Unable to execute 'onLoad' in script 'scripts/ant.xml' as the script is not trusted
is this currently expected broken for IG builds?
If you're talking about the auto builder, then yes. See https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179252-IG-creation/topic/Publisher.20Error.3A.20Unable.20to.20execute.20'onLoad'.20in.20script.20'scrip
Grahame should be back tomorrow and will hopefully have time to merge the relevant pull request and put out a new publisher.
